name: Action Boy Takashi
description:
Takashi is a Japanese character that has super powers like freezing time.
Takashi was just in a football match with friends. He was wearing a no.7 football shirt while bad guys were coming to city. He found himself in a war place and he was the man who will save all the city.

Game features:

3D Game Graphics
Free Roam in City - Use Any Cars, Tanks Even Jetpacks.
30 Very Hard Missions to Complete
Shopping Function - Buy anything with money you earned in the game.

%100 free Action Boy Tekashi Game - Download Now!
